verses.verse: Not to us, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> not to us, But to Thy name <S%H8034><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> of Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of Thy truth. <S%H571><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> should the nations <S%H1471><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Where, <S%H346><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> is their God <S%H430><s%>?"
But our God <S%H430><s%> is in the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> He does <S%H6213><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> He pleases. <S%H2654><s%>
Their idols <S%H6091><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> The work <S%H4639><s%> of man's hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> speak; <S%H1696><s%> They have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> see; <S%H7200><s%>
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> They have noses, <S%H639><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> smell; <S%H9552><s%>

They have hands, <S%H3027><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> feel; <S%H4184><s%> They have feet, <S%H7272><s%> but they cannot <S%H3808><s%> walk; <S%H1980><s%> They cannot <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H1897><s%> a sound <S%H1897><s%> with their throat. <S%H1627><s%>
Those who make <S%H6213><s%> them will become <S%H1961><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> them, Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in them.
O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
You who fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has been <S%H2142><s%> mindful <S%H2142><s%> of us; He will bless <S%H1288><s%> [us]; He will bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> He will bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron. <S%H175><s%>
He will bless <S%H1288><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> The small <S%H6996><s%> together <S%H5973><s%> with the great. <S%H1419><s%>
May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> give <S%H3254><s%> you increase, <S%H3254><s%> You and your children. <S%H1121><s%>
May you be blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Maker <S%H6213><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are the heavens <S%H8064><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> But the earth <S%H776><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
The dead <S%H4191><s%> do not praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord, <S%H3050><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> [do] any <S%H3605><s%> who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into silence; <S%H1745><s%>

But as for us, we will bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3050><s%> From this <S%H6258><s%> time <S%H6258><s%> forth and forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
